languages.text: "Что ж... приятно знать, что местная рыгаловка возбуждает интерес не только у бандюганов и забулдыг. Впрочем, "Амасекус" — как грокс: на лицо страшенный как смерть, зато нутро, если правильно разделать, на редкость полезно".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж... приятно знать, что местная рыгаловка возбуждает интерес не только у бандюганов и забулдыг. Впрочем, "Амасекус" — как грокс: на лицо страшенный как смерть, зато нутро, если правильно разделать, на редкость полезно".

languages.text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."
languages.original_text: "Что ж... приятно знать, что местная рыгаловка возбуждает интерес не только у бандюганов и забулдыг. Впрочем, "Амасекус" — как грокс: на лицо страшенный как смерть, зато нутро, если правильно разделать, на редкость полезно".

traits.locale_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the looks are horrible, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

"Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the looks are horrible, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

"Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

"Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

"Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

languages.text: “嗯……如果除了暴徒和酒鬼之外，这间酒吧还能引起其他人的兴趣，那确实是个好消息。话说回来，烈酒修会就像一头格洛克斯兽一样。尽管外表看起来很吓人，但如果你有手腕的话，这里其实会派上很大用场。”
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……如果除了暴徒和酒鬼之外，这间酒吧还能引起其他人的兴趣，那确实是个好消息。话说回来，烈酒修会就像一头格洛克斯兽一样。尽管外表看起来很吓人，但如果你有手腕的话，这里其实会派上很大用场。”

languages.text: «Anda... Me alegra saber que no solo atrae a matones y alcohólicos. Aunque el Amasecus es como un grox: el exterior es horrendo, pero el interior es de gran utilidad si sabes lo que haces».
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: «Anda... Me alegra saber que no solo atrae a matones y alcohólicos. Aunque el Amasecus es como un grox: el exterior es horrendo, pero el interior es de gran utilidad si sabes lo que haces».

languages.text: 「ふーん…まあ、ごろつきや酔っ払い以外にこの場所に興味を持ってくれる人がいてよかったよ。ま、アマセッカスは蜥蜴牛みたいなもんだ―見た目は最悪だけど、何を探しているのかわかっていれば中には役に立つようなものがわんさかある」
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: 「ふーん…まあ、ごろつきや酔っ払い以外にこの場所に興味を持ってくれる人がいてよかったよ。ま、アマセッカスは蜥蜴牛みたいなもんだ―見た目は最悪だけど、何を探しているのかわかっていれば中には役に立つようなものがわんさかある」

languages.text: "Nun ... es freut mich, dass dieser Laden auch das Interesse von Leuten erregt, die nicht nur raufen und saufen. Das Amasecus ist so ähnlich wie ein Grox – von außen hässlich anzusehen, aber innen enorm nützlich, wenn man weiß, was man tut."
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: "Nun ... es freut mich, dass dieser Laden auch das Interesse von Leuten erregt, die nicht nur raufen und saufen. Das Amasecus ist so ähnlich wie ein Grox – von außen hässlich anzusehen, aber innen enorm nützlich, wenn man weiß, was man tut."

languages.text: « Eh ben... c'est toujours sympa de voir que ce tripot n'attire pas que l'attention des bandits et des alcooliques. Enfin, l'Amasecus, c'est un peu comme un grox : affreusement laid au premier abord, mais ouvrez-lui le bide et plongez les mains dans ses entrailles, et c'est une tout autre histoire, si vous savez comment vous y prendre. »
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: « Eh ben... c'est toujours sympa de voir que ce tripot n'attire pas que l'attention des bandits et des alcooliques. Enfin, l'Amasecus, c'est un peu comme un grox : affreusement laid au premier abord, mais ouvrez-lui le bide et plongez les mains dans ses entrailles, et c'est une tout autre histoire, si vous savez comment vous y prendre. »

languages.text: "Ya... Eşkıyalar ve ayyaşlardan başka insanların da bu salaş barı merak ettiğini öğrenmek güzel. Gerçi Amasekus biraz groksa benzer. Dışını gören iğrense de bu işten anlayanlar, içinden faydalanmasını bilir."
languages.original_text: "Well... it sure is nice to know that this dive piques the interest of people other than thugs and boozers. Then again, the Amasecus is like a grox — the outside's horrible to look at, but the insides are remarkably useful if you know what you're doing."

traits.locale_text: "Demek... Eşkıyalar ve ayyaşlardan başka insanların da bu salaş barı merak ettiğini öğrendiğime sevindim. Gerçi Amasekus biraz da groksa benzer... Dışını gören iğrense de, bu işten anlayanlar içinden faydalanmasını bilir."
